resources.string: The information provided below are for education purpose only. Please contact your local health authority
How long can COVID-19 live on surface?
How does the Coronavirus disease spread?
How do I know if someone is infected?
"Coronavirus disease(COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by a new virus"

Coronavirus disease spreads through contact with an infected person when they cough or sneeze. it also spreads when a person tourches a surface or object that has the virus on it, then touches their eyes,nose or mouth. Source(Who.int)

"Wash your hands regularly for 20 seconds. with soap and water or alcohol base hand rob
	 Cover your nose and mouth with a disposable tissue or flex elbow when you cough or sneeze
	 Avoid close contact with people who are unwell (1metre to 3metre)
	 Stay home and self isolate from others in the household if you feel unwell

It is not certain how long the virus that causes COVID-19 survives on surfaces, but it seems to behave like other coronaviruses. Studies suggest that coronaviruses (including preliminary information on the COVID-19 virus) may persist on surfaces for a few hours or up to several days.

"People may experience:
	 cough
	 fever
	 Sore throat
	 Tiredness
	 difficulty breathing (severe cases)
	Unexplained loss of taste or smell
	 In rare cases, COVID-19 can lead to severe respiratory problems, kidney failure or death."

"COVID-19 virus can be transmitted in areas with hot and humid climates.

Cold weather and snow CANNOT kill the new coronavirus.

 Taking a hot bath does not prevent the new coronavirus disease.

 The new coronavirus CANNOT be transmitted through mosquito bites.

 Spraying alcohol or chlorine all over your body will not kill viruses that have already entered your body.

 Vaccines against pneumonia, such as pneumococcal vaccine and Haemophilus influenza type B (Hib) vaccine, do not provide protection against the new coronavirus.

 Using antibiotics CANNOT cure you of coranvirus. Antibiotics do not work against viruses, only bacteria.
